servers.description: Cafcass APIs to retrieve case data and docs

info.description: This document present details of third-party organisations to retrieve case data and documents from the CFT case management system
info.title: Cafcass APIs

get.summary: Search and return cases according to the provided parameters

429.description: rate limit error or too many requests

get.summary: Streams contents of the most recent document associated with the case document. ResponseEntity<ByteArrayResource> more info can be find here>> https://github.com/hmcts/ccd-case-document-am-api/blob/master/src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/reform/ccd/documentam/controller/endpoints/CaseDocumentAmController.java#L167

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: retrieve case document by document ID

400.description: Case document Id is not valid

429.description: rate limit error or too many requests

items.example: Evidence of relevant criminal proceedings for a domestic abuse offence which have not concluded

miamUrgencyReason.example: There is risk to the life, liberty or physical safety of the prospective applicant or his or her family or his or her home

miamOtherExemptionReasons.example: A child is one of the prospective parties

mpuApplicantUnableToAttendMiamReason1.example: Reasons applicant unable to attend MIAM

mpuApplicantUnableToAttendMiamReason2.example: Reasons applicant unable to attend MIAM

hearingVenueName.example: ROYAL COURTS OF JUSTICE - QUEENS BUILDING (AND WEST GREEN BUILDING)

orderType.example: Child arrangements, specific issue or prohibited steps order (C43)

regionId.example: 2 (Either you will get regionId or region)

region.example: 2 (Either you will get regionId or region)

baseLocation.example: 497679 (Either you will get baseLocationId or baseLocation)

baseLocationId.example: 497679 (Either you will get baseLocationId or baseLocation)

childAndApplicantRelations.description: This array will have All Applicants relationship to each of the child

childAndRespondentRelations.description: This array will have All Respondents relationship to each of the child

childAndOtherPeopleRelations.description: This array will have All Other People relationship to each of the child
